Education Background:
Andersen obtained his secondary school diploma from Nørre GYM in 1986.
Andersen earned his degree from International Business Academy (IBA) in 1991.
Occupation History:
Andersen Jensen Mikkelsen is a 58 year old Associate from Denmark.
Andersen Jensen Mikkelsen began his professional journey as a Analyst at Advent International Danmark A/S in 1991, laying the foundation for future success.
At KKR & Co. Danmark A/S, he held the position of Associate from 1994 till now, making significant contributions to the organization.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 5030000 DKK, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 4827000 DKK.


In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 1440000 DKK from his late grandfather, a renowned Neurosurgeon, in 2009.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting him in achieving his financial goals.
